name: Attack Decay Swell
description: This is an example that shows how to use the fx_adsr_envelope effect to control the attack and decay of a played note.  The ADSR envelope standads  for attack-decay-sustain-release and controls how quickly a note fades and out.   The sketch also demonstrates how to route the new note pedal event to the ADSR envelope  so each time you play a new note, the ADSR envelope is applied.  By turning attack and release way down, each note sounds like a quick pluck.  And increase attack creates a swell  effect like an ebow.
center-pot-function: Volume of output.  For longer swells, a bit more gain is needed.
creator: DreamMaker
